hero_description: The modern, intuitive note-taking app that helps you capture ideas, organize thoughts, and boost productivity with style.
features_subtitle: Everything you need to capture, organize, and find your notes effortlessly
feature_smart_desc: Organize your notes with intelligent tagging and powerful search capabilities
feature_fast_desc: Create, edit, and find your notes in milliseconds with our optimized interface
feature_secure_desc: Your data is encrypted and protected with industry-standard security
feature_beautiful_desc: Enjoy a stunning, modern interface that makes note-taking a pleasure
feature_search_desc: Find any note instantly with advanced tag-based filtering
feature_cloud_desc: Access your notes anywhere, anytime with automatic cloud synchronization
cta_description: Join thousands of users who are already organizing their thoughts with QuickNotes
